pages.title: Psilocybin
pages.text: Grants the user night vision, slowness, and an appreciation for the small details of nature

pages.title: Penicillin
pages.text: Clears all status effects from the user and heals them a small amount

pages.title: Epinephrine
pages.text: The user gains night vision and an increase in speed

pages.title: Caffeine
pages.text: The user gains night vision and an increase in speed, same as epinephrine

pages.title: Cocaine
pages.text: The user can jump and run around like a cheetah
